step.reason: \text{If }dt = \cos x\,dx \text{, then }t =\sin x\\ \text{Moreover }\dfrac{1}{\left(1 -\sin x\right)\left(2 -\sin x\right)} = \dfrac{1}{\left(1 -t\right)\left(2-t \right)}\\ \qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad=\dfrac{A}{1 - t} + \dfrac{B}{2-t}\\ \implies 1 = A \left(2-t\right) + B \left(1-t\right) \\ \qquad\qquad= \left(2A + B\right) - \left(A +B\right)t\\ \text{Comparing the coefficients, we get }A +B = 0 \\ \text{and }2A+B = 1\implies A = 1 \text{ and }B = -1
